mapper.select: SELECT r.role_label FROM ez_admin_sys_role r INNER JOIN ez_admin_sys_user_role_relation ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1
SELECT ur.role_id FROM ez_admin_sys_user_role_relation ur INNER JOIN ez_admin_sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1

SELECT m.menu_id AS menuId, m.menu_perm AS menuPerm, m.menu_type AS menuType, r.role_id AS roleId FROM ez_admin_sys_role r INNER JOIN ez_admin_sys_role_menu_relation rm ON r.role_id = rm.role_id INNER JOIN ez_admin_sys_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE r.role_label = #{roleLabel} AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1
